name: Kestrel / OpenC2 hunting playbook. Implements the equivalent of the Jupyter notebook for the April 2024 plugfest; see:
description:
Kestrel / OpenC2 hunt playbook for the April 2024 CASP Village plugfest; implements the equivalent of the Jupyter notebook posted by Kestrel. See:
 https://github.com/opencybersecurityalliance/casp/blob/main/Plugfests/2024-03-NorthernVirginia/SweatEquity/IBM/complete_hunt.ipynb

while-condition--14d5afba-d4cb-41cb-87e0.name: Await OpenC2 Response
while-condition--14d5afba-d4cb-41cb-87e0.description: Hold pending response message from specified OpenC2 Consumer(s)

action--ea148823-dde1-4744-a794-6edbbf8d.name: OC2/Hunt: Identify Available Hunt Flows
action--ea148823-dde1-4744-a794-6edbbf8d.description: Query Hunt consumer to identify available hunt flows.

while-condition--aa01b160-1022-4124-9c4d.name: Await Next Step
while-condition--aa01b160-1022-4124-9c4d.description: Hold until ready to execute next demonstration step

action--4e1038a7-eecd-4d81-9fe5-c01266da.name: OpenC2/Hunt AP: Search for IoB
action--4e1038a7-eecd-4d81-9fe5-c01266da.description: Executes a hunt flow to look for actions corresponding to the "disable firewall" IoB; this invokes huntflow "oc2-hunt-1.jhf" and returns the identity of a suspicious process

while-condition--3e1fdca7-3fdc-4be1-9a44.name: Await OpenC2 Response
while-condition--3e1fdca7-3fdc-4be1-9a44.description: Hold pending response message from specified OpenC2 Consumer(s)

action--e8e11d27-9701-45cc-a0da-f38efd39.name: Command: Display Failure
action--e8e11d27-9701-45cc-a0da-f38efd39.description: Command TwMH green or red depending on response result

if-condition--f2183016-8f28-4033-b975-3a.name: Response = Successful?
if-condition--f2183016-8f28-4033-b975-3a.description: Check if the response to the hunting command is success or failure

if-condition--02e3628e-a391-4fba-94a0-36.name: Response = Successful?
if-condition--02e3628e-a391-4fba-94a0-36.description: Check if the response to the hunting command is success or failure

while-condition--bc6b619c-2352-4d5d-b1bd.name: Await Next Step
while-condition--bc6b619c-2352-4d5d-b1bd.description: Hold until ready to execute next demonstration step

action--a1af285b-b987-47ff-91c3-5e91f3fe.name: OC2/Hunt: Backtrack Ancestry
action--a1af285b-b987-47ff-91c3-5e91f3fe.description: Executes a hunt to look for parent processes of the one that disabled the firewall. This corresponds to "oc2-hunt-1.hf", and returns several generations of parent processes.

while-condition--4e3f27ad-d15f-4494-bbad.name: Await OpenC2 Response
while-condition--4e3f27ad-d15f-4494-bbad.description: Hold pending response message from specified OpenC2 Consumer(s)

if-condition--c377485e-5d4c-462f-9ca9-8b.name: Response = Successful?
if-condition--c377485e-5d4c-462f-9ca9-8b.description: Check if the response to the hunting command is success or failure

while-condition--80b8ade8-1bc8-4165-be11.name: Await Next Step
while-condition--80b8ade8-1bc8-4165-be11.description: Hold until ready to execute next demonstration step

action--cb1af24d-d214-4036-99d4-6feb12d2.name: OC2/Hunt: Discover Siblings
action--cb1af24d-d214-4036-99d4-6feb12d2.description: Executes a hunt to look for sibling processes of the one that disabled the firewall. This corresponds to "oc2-hunt-3.hf", and returns a list of processes spawned by the ancestor processes identified in the previous stage.

while-condition--38c41a08-7f06-4310-88c9.name: Await OpenC2 Response
while-condition--38c41a08-7f06-4310-88c9.description: Hold pending response message from specified OpenC2 Consumer(s)

if-condition--ae189b06-ceb4-447f-86ae-c7.name: Response = Successful?
if-condition--ae189b06-ceb4-447f-86ae-c7.description: Check if the response to the hunting command is success or failure

if-condition--c64f1bf0-8b74-46db-84d3-de.name: Await Next Step
if-condition--c64f1bf0-8b74-46db-84d3-de.description: Hold until ready to execute next demonstration step

action--ee4348de-66e6-4cfa-9a1c-78f4edcd.name: OC2/Hunt: Correlate Networking
action--ee4348de-66e6-4cfa-9a1c-78f4edcd.description: Executes a hunt to look for network traffic associated with the processes identified in previous hunting steps. This corresponds to "oc2-hunt-4.hf", and returns remote IP addresses contacted by the processes identified.

while-condition--0f189468-a9a8-4c3b-b992.name: Await OpenC2 Response
while-condition--0f189468-a9a8-4c3b-b992.description: Hold pending response message from specified OpenC2 Consumer(s)

if-condition--ade4f580-c9ac-48af-8f54-48.description: Check if the response to the hunting command is success or failure
